has research problem.from sentence: Neural Question Generation from Text : A Preliminary Study
Automatic question generation aims to generate questions from a text passage where the generated questions can be answered by certain sub- spans of the given passage .

has research problem: Automatic question generation from natural language text

has research problem.from sentence: Automatic question generation from natural language text aims to generate questions taking text as input , which has the potential value of education purpose ) .
As the reverse task of question answering , question generation also has the potential for providing a large scale corpus of question - answer pairs .
